name: Facility Billing Arrangement
title: FBA
definition: Indicates a special arrangement has been negotiated between the host customer of a higher level service and the subsequent customer of the lower level service.
validEntryNotes: An entry in one or more of positions 2 through 4 is required when position 1 is “D”.
usageNotes: Required when the ACT field is “N” “C” or “T” and   the ACNA field is different from the ACNA   associated with the facility (CFA and/or SCFA) and   the UNE and CC fields are not populated.
Required when the ACT field is “N” “C” or “T” and   the ACNA field is different from the ACNA   associated with the facility (CFA and/or SCFA) and   the UNE and CC fields are not populated.
Optional when the ACT field is “R” and the ACNA   field is different from the ACNA associated with the   facility (CFA and/or SCFA) and the UNE and CC   fields are not populated.
